projects.title: Tenzies
projects.description: An interactive dice game built with React where players roll until all dice show the same number. Implements real-time timer functionality and persistent high score tracking using localStorage and React hooks.*This project deepened my understanding of React's useState and useEffect hooks for managing game state and side effects. I learned to implement browser storage APIs for data persistence across sessions.*The main challenge was synchronizing the timer with game state updates and ensuring localStorage operations didn't cause performance issues or bugs when rapidly clicking the roll button.

projects.title: ChefClaude
projects.description: A recipe generator web app that uses AI to create custom recipes based on user-provided ingredients. Integrates with an AI API to process natural language responses and render them as structured recipe content.*Working with AI APIs taught me how to craft effective prompts, handle streaming responses, and parse unstructured text data into React components. I gained experience managing asynchronous API calls and implementing error handling for external service dependencies.*The biggest challenge was parsing the AI's free-form text responses into a consistent, renderable format. I had to implement robust text parsing logic to extract recipe steps, ingredients, and cooking times from varied response structures, while handling edge cases where the AI returned unexpected formats.

projects.title: Van Life
projects.description: This landing page was made to practice how to use React Router.*
